items.sentence: Our math teacher drew a circle on the blackboard.
If there were a problem, Tom would say something.
If you could assist me, it would be a great help.
It won\'t be easy persuading Tom to come with us.

It\'ll be hard to convince Tom to sell his house.
I can\'t get away from the office this afternoon.
I can\'t go out because I have a lot of homework.
What if someone kidnapped Tom? What would you do?
What non-prescription medications are you taking?
